text: Bricquebec is a former commune. It is in Normandy in the Manche department in northwest France. On 1 January 2016, it was merged into the new commune of Bricquebec-en-Cotentin.Arrêté préfectoral 4/15 December 2015 == Twin towns == Bricquebec is twinned with: * New Alresford, England, United Kingdom * Lachendorf, Germany * Sremski Karlovci, Serbia == References == Category:Former communes in Manche
title: Bricquebec
